Pre-Game Insights: The Portland Trail Blazers look to snap a two-game losing streak with a victory on the road Saturday when visiting the Milwaukee Bucks.
Milwaukee is 17-15 and second in the Central Division, 11 Â½ games behind the first-place Cleveland Cavaliers.
Milwaukee was defeated by the Brooklyn Nets 113-110 on Thursday. The Bucks have lost three out of the last four.

Giannis Antetokounmpo leads Milwaukee in scoring and rebounding, averaging 32.6 points and 11.6 rebounds per game. Damian Lillard is second in scoring and the leader in assists, averaging 25.2 points and 7.6 assists per game.
Milwaukee is 14th in points allowed at 111.9 points per game and Portland is 23rd at 117.2 points per day.
